FragilityCurve.Description: Stair consists of steel stringers with precast treads rigidly linked to stringer
FragilityCurve.Name: Hybrid stair assembly with steel stringers and concrete treads and landings with seismic joints that accommodate drift.
FragilityCurve.Author: Not Given
FragilityCurve.Notes: User to provide median demand and dispersion values. The values listed are default PACT values and do not represent the response of this component. ConsequenceGroup.RepairMeasures: Protect surrounding space. Minor repair of finishes. Modify or relocate mechanical and electrical as required for repair work.
Protect floor, cut out damaged areas, reweld. Repair finishes. Modify or relocate mechanical and electrical as required for repair work.

Protect area, remove damaged stair including landings and handrails. Remove and reinstall damaged soffit and mechanical systems. Replace stair, landings, and handrail. Modify or relocate mechanical and electrical as required for repair work.
